channel.title: Creating User Interfaces, Spring 2025
channel.description: Class website for Creating User Interfaces at SUNY Purchase College, spring 2025

item.title: Week 1 - History and Intro to Interfaces
item.description: This week is an overview of the class and an intro to GUIs

item.title: Week 2 - Intro to Command Line and Text User Interfaces
item.description: This week we learn about the original command line interfaces, how they're still used, and create our own.

item.title: Week 3 - Building interfaces with HTML and CSS
item.description: An overview of building interfaces with HTML and CSS, the building blocks of design for the web.

item.title: Week 5 - User Design Methodology
item.description: A general overview of an iterative user-focused design methodology

item.title: Week 6 - User Experience
item.description: This week we use CSS to make user-friendlier design

item.title: Week 7 - UI design patterns
item.description: An introduction to building common UI patterns through UI widgets

item.title: Week 8 - Bringing it all together - Complete functional application
item.description: This is a catch-up week where we will build a complete functional application and interface, using HTML, CSS and Javascript.

item.title: Week 9 - Design patterns
item.description: An intro to common UI design patterns

item.title: Week 11 - Intro to Voice User Interfaces
item.description: An introduction to designing voice user interfaces

item.title: Week 12 - Building a VUI-controlled game
item.description: This week we cover a methodology for creating a game controlled via voice user interface

item.title: Week 13 - Machine Learning and facial/gesture recognition for UI
item.description: This week we review facial and image recognition, its use for interface design, and privacy issues.

item.title: Week 14 - Accessibility presentations
item.description: A peer-led overview of accessibility and interface design.
